title: Why Macron is right on Eurobonds
summary_full: Common EU borrowing would have substantial benefits. But the subject remains neuralgic in some member states, who fear of being drawn into a fiscal union in which countries become responsible for each other's debts
summary_public: Common EU borrowing would have substantial benefits. But the subject remains neuralgic in some member states, who fear of being drawn into a fiscal union in which countries become responsible for each other's debts
